channel.title: Need help with npc drops!
channel.description:
i need help with project corrupted base i dont wnana leech it !!!!!! :D i changed some drops but when i try to run server this happens
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2168) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:111) Project Corrupted
pls tell me where did i make mistake and how do i correct it !!!! :confused: :confused:

item.title: Need help with npc drops!
